title: Apartment for Sale in Pelawatte
details:
Brand new 3 Bed room apartment on the 5th floor. It has 15 units on 5 floors.
• 1 Master bed room with one attached bathroom.
• 2 Rooms with one common Bathroom.
• Living and Dining Area.
• Pantry (without cooker).
• Balconies with the view of city and lush greenery.
LKR 29 Million
(No Brokers accepted)

Matarage Real Estate Consultants (PVT) Ltd
